SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveParking
Represents an active parking record as stored in the database.
BaseController
Base interface for all GUI controllers that need a ChatClient connection.
ChatClient
ChatClient represents the client-side connection to the server in the BPARK system.
ChatIF
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
ClientController
ClientController manages the flow, logic, and UI interaction for the client-side of the BPARK application.
ConnectionPool
ConnectionPool is a manual implementation of a simple connection pooling mechanism.
DailySubscriberCount
Represents the number of subscribers that visited or were active on a specific day.
DBExecutor
DBExecutor provides utility methods to simplify database access using a connection pool.
EchoServer
EchoServer is a server-side class that listens for client connections and handles messages sent by the client.
GetSiteActivityResponse
A response object sent from the server containing: A list of future reservations.
LoginManagementRequest
Represents login credentials for a management-level user in the system.
LoginRequest
Represents a login request sent from a client to the server.
Main
Main class for launching the JavaFX client application of the BPARK system.
MainWelcomeController
Controller for the main welcome screen.
ManagementController
ManagementController is the main JavaFX controller responsible for the administrative interface in the BPARK system.
MemberStatusReportRequest
Represents a request to generate a monthly report about subscriber activity.
MemberStatusReportResponse
Represents the server's response to a MemberStatusReportRequest.
mysqlConnection
This class provides database-related utility methods for managing BPARK system data, such as subscribers, reservations, parking spots, and active parkings.
NotificationController
Sends various email notifications via Gmail SMTP using Jakarta Mail API.
ParkingDurationRecord
Represents a record of parking duration for a specific day, used for reporting and analytics.
ParkingDurationRequest
A request sent from the client to the server, asking for a parking duration report for a specific year and month.
ParkingDurationResponse
A response sent from the server to the client containing a list of ParkingDurationRecord objects.
ParkingHistory
Represents a single parking history record for a subscriber.
PasswordResetRequest
Represents a password reset request sent from the client to the server.
PasswordResetResponse
Represents the server's response to a PasswordResetRequest.
RegisterMemberRequest
Represents a request to register a new subscriber (member) in the system.
Reservation
Represents a reservation made by a subscriber for a parking spot.
SchedulerController
SchedulerTasks is responsible for initiating background tasks that run periodically.
ServerController
ServerController manages the server-side GUI interactions.
ServerMain
ServerMain is the main entry point for the server application.
Subscriber
Represents a registered subscriber in the BPARK system.
TerminalController
TerminalController manages the terminal interface in the BPARK system.
UpdateReservationRequest
Represents a request to update the date and time of an existing reservation.
UpdateSubscriberDetailsRequest
Represents a request sent by a client to update a subscriber's contact details.
